name: KILL
description:
welcome to ROCK!you are the last on the island who survived the virus of the population,You will survive or become one of the infected?it's up to you!in Rock you have a lot of work to do to survive the apocalypse, you have a lot of things to do here-Weapons,Mele Weapons, Building system, gathering system,hunting system,smelting system,Crafting,and much more!

Hunting Animals-Hunt animals to get meat and ingredients for production, and survival

CRAFTING-Weapon,Bullet,Mele Weapon,Materials, etc"

Building system-Build your own house and house equipment!
